mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM iclass ic, iuser iu, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate and ic.user_id = iu.user_id and ic.class_state = 'show'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, classlist.* FROM ( SELECT ic.class_id, ic.class_totalmember, ic.class_image, iu.user_nickname, ic.class_title, ic.class_startdate, ic.class_enddate, ic.class_time, ic.class_level, exercise_kind, exercise_date, ic.class_price FROM iclass ic, iuser iu, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate and ic.user_id = iu.user_id and ic.class_state = 'show'
) classlist WHERE ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT count(*) FROM iclass ic, iuser iu, iuserinfo, buy, pay, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate and ic.user_id = iu.user_id and ic.class_state = 'show' and buy.buy_id = pay.buy_id and buy.user_id = #{userId} and pay.pay_state = 'pay' and buy.class_id = ic.class_id and iu.user_id = iuserinfo.user_id

) clsre WHERE clsre.class_id = buyre.class_id and ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
